name: Patient Clinical Model 1.0
description: Initial release of PIQI patient model

attributes.name: Demographics data class
attributes.description: Patient demographics

attributes.name: deceased
attributes.description: In indicator that the patient is deceased

attributes.name: birthSex
attributes.description: The patients birth sex

attributes.name: genderIdentity
attributes.description: The patients gender identity

attributes.name: race
attributes.description: The patients race

attributes.name: ethnicity
attributes.description: The patients ethnicity

attributes.name: maritalStatus
attributes.description: The patients marital status

attributes.name: primaryLanguage
attributes.description: The patients primary language

attributes.name: deathDate
attributes.description: The patients date of death

attributes.name: patientIdentifier
attributes.description: The patients identifier

attributes.name: birthDate
attributes.description: The patients date of birth

attributes.name: Allergies data class
attributes.description: Patent allergies and substance intolerances

attributes.name: substance
attributes.description: Substance that triggers the patient reaction

attributes.name: category
attributes.description: Allergy category - typically the nature of the allergy - drug, food, chemical substance

attributes.name: reaction
attributes.description: The reaction elicited by the allergen / substance

attributes.name: severity
attributes.description: The severity of the allergic reaction

attributes.name: effectiveDate
attributes.description: The effective date of the allergy

attributes.name: Conditions data class
attributes.description: Patient problems, conditions and diagnoses.

attributes.name: condition
attributes.description: The problem, diagnosis or condition concept being documented

attributes.name: conditionStatus
attributes.description: The clinical status for the condition. This may be confirmed, suspected, refuted or other indicator of the condition status.

attributes.name: onsetDate
attributes.description: The onset date for the condition

attributes.name: resolutionDate
attributes.description: The resolution date for the condition

attributes.name: Immunizations data class
attributes.description: Patient vaccines and immunizations.

attributes.name: immunization
attributes.description: The concept representing the vaccine or immunization

attributes.name: reaction
attributes.description: The patient reaction to the immunization

attributes.name: immunizationStatus
attributes.description: The immunization status for the immunization.  May include that the immunization was refused.

attributes.name: expirationDate
attributes.description: Th expiration date of the immunization

attributes.name: administrationDate
attributes.description: The administration date for the immunization

attributes.name: lotNumber
attributes.description: The immunization lot number

attributes.name: Lab Results data class
attributes.description: Patient laboratory results.

attributes.name: referenceRange
attributes.description: The reference range for the laboratory test result.

attributes.name: resultValue
attributes.description: The result value for the performed laboratory test.  It may represent a string, numeric value or concept representing a qualitative result.

attributes.name: test
attributes.description: The concept representing the test performed as a result of a laboratory order.

attributes.name: order
attributes.description: The concept representing the lab order.

attributes.name: resultUnit
attributes.description: The unit of measure for the lab result value.

attributes.name: interpretation
attributes.description: The interpretation associated with the laboratory result value.

attributes.name: specimenType
attributes.description: A concept representing the patient substance used to perform the test.

attributes.name: resultStatus
attributes.description: The status of the laboratory test result.  May be used to indicate partial, final or amended results.

attributes.name: performingSite
attributes.description: The site where the lab test was performed

attributes.name: specimenCondition
attributes.description: The concept representing the condition of the specimen used to perform the laboratory test.

attributes.name: specimenSourceSite
attributes.description: The concept used to represent the site for the specimen used to perform the test.

attributes.name: issuedDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the lab test result was issued

attributes.name: orderDate
attributes.description: The date and time the laboratory order was initiated.

attributes.name: performedDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the lab test was performed

attributes.name: specimenidentifier
attributes.description: The identifier for the specimen used to perform the laboratory test.

attributes.name: specimenCollectionDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the specimen for the laboratory test was collected.

attributes.name: Diagnostic Imaging data class
attributes.description: Patient diagnostic imaging results.

attributes.name: procedure
attributes.description: the concept representing the diagnostic imaging procedure.

attributes.name: hasAttachment
attributes.description: An indicator representing whether or not a digital attachment was present in the original diagnostic imaging resource. (Interpreted and populated by the PIQI converter)

attributes.name: reportDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the diagnostic imaging was performed.

attributes.name: interpretation
attributes.description: The interpretation of the diagnostic images.

attributes.name: Medications data class
attributes.description: Patient medication statements.

attributes.name: doseRoute
attributes.description: The concept representing the route of administration for the medication.

attributes.name: doseQuantityUnit
attributes.description: The unit of measure for dose unit based dosing.

attributes.name: medication
attributes.description: The concept representing the specific dispensable medication.

attributes.name: doseAmountUnit
attributes.description: The unit for the dose amount

attributes.name: adherence
attributes.description: The concept representing the patient's current adherence status with respect to the medication.

attributes.name: indication
attributes.description: The concept representing the reason the patient is taking the medication.

attributes.name: fillStatus
attributes.description: The concept representing the fill status for the medication.

attributes.name: endDate
attributes.description: The date the patient stopped taking the medication.

attributes.name: doseQuantity
attributes.description: The dose quantity for unit dose based dosing

attributes.name: startDate
attributes.description: The date that the patient starting taking the medication.

attributes.name: doseAmount
attributes.description: The dose amount for the medication.  This would be used to represent strength, or volume based dosing.

attributes.name: instructions
attributes.description: The dosing instructions.  May include frequency, intervals and additional instructions.

attributes.name: statementDate
attributes.description: The date of the medication statement.

attributes.name: Procedures data class
attributes.description: Patient medical and surgical procedures.

attributes.name: procedure
attributes.description: The concept representing the procedure.

attributes.name: procedureReason
attributes.description: The concept representing the reason the patient had the procedure performed.

attributes.name: procedure status
attributes.description: The concept representing the procedure status.

attributes.name: procedureDateTime
attributes.description: Do not use - deprecated

attributes.name: procedure performed date
attributes.description: The date and time the procedure was performed.

attributes.name: Vital Signs data class
attributes.description: Patient vital sign measurements.

attributes.name: referenceRange
attributes.description: The reference range for the vital sign measurement.

attributes.name: resultValue
attributes.description: The vital sign result value.  This may be a string, a numeric value or a concept representing a quality result.

attributes.name: resultUnit
attributes.description: The result unit for the vital sign result.

attributes.name: performingSite
attributes.description: The concept representing where the vital sign was collected,

attributes.name: vitalSign
attributes.description: The concept representing the vital sign observation.

attributes.name: interpretation
attributes.description: The interpretation of the vital sign value.

attributes.name: resultStatus
attributes.description: The concept representing the vital sign result status.

attributes.name: performedDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the vital sign measurement was performed.

attributes.name: issuedDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the vital sign was issued.

dataClasses.name: Medical Devices
dataClasses.description: Patient implanted and prosthetic medical devices.

attributes.name: Medical Devices data class
attributes.description: Patient implanted and prosthetic medical devices.

attributes.name: deviceType
attributes.description: The concept representing the type of medical device.

attributes.name: deviceStatus
attributes.description: The concept representing the status of the medical device.

attributes.name: deviceID
attributes.description: The unique identifier for the medical device.

attributes.name: implantationDate
attributes.description: The date and time the medical device was implanted.

attributes.name: Health Assessments data class
attributes.description: Patient health assessment observations.

attributes.name: resultValue
attributes.description: The result value for the health assessment observation.  This may be a string, a numeric result of a concept representing a qualitative result.

attributes.name: assessment
attributes.description: The concept representing the health assessment observation.

attributes.name: resultUnit
attributes.description: The result unit for the health assessment observation.

attributes.name: effectiveDate
attributes.description: The date and time the health assessment was performed.

attributes.name: IssueDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the health assessment result was issued.

attributes.name: Clinical Documents data class
attributes.description: Patient clinical documents,

attributes.name: documentType
attributes.description: The concept representing the type of clinical document.

attributes.name: documentStatus
attributes.description: The concept representing the status of the clinical document.

attributes.name: effectiveDate
attributes.description: The effective date and time of the document.

attributes.name: documentTitle
attributes.description: The document title the the clinical document.

attributes.name: hasAttachment
attributes.description: The indicator representing whether or not the original clinical document resource included a digital attachment.  (Interpreted and populated by the PIQI converter)

attributes.name: Encounters data class
attributes.description: Patient healthcare encounters.

attributes.name: encounter status
attributes.description: The concept representing the status of the encounter.

attributes.name: encounter diagnosis
attributes.description: The concept representing the encounter diagnosis or chief complaint.

attributes.name: encounter reason
attributes.description: The concept representing the reason for the encounter.

attributes.name: encounter type
attributes.description: The concept representing the category of health care service. (e.g., office visit, telephone assessment, home visit)

attributes.name: encounter location
attributes.description: The encounter location.

attributes.name: encounter date/time
attributes.description: The date and time of the start of the encounter

attributes.name: encounter end date/time
attributes.description: The date and time the encounter concluded.

attributes.name: encounter disposition
attributes.description: The encounter representing the encounter disposition.

attributes.name: encounter identifier
attributes.description: The unique identifier for the encounter.

attributes.name: Goals data class
attributes.description: Patient healthcare related goals.

attributes.name: goal
attributes.description: The concept representing the patient goal.  (SDOH goals, Treatable Prevention Preferences, Care Experience Preferences, etc.)

attributes.name: goalCategory
attributes.description: The concept representing the category of the goal.

attributes.name: goalPriority
attributes.description: The priority of the goal.

attributes.name: goalStatus
attributes.description: The concept representing the status of the goal.

attributes.name: startDate
attributes.description: The date and time the patient goal was initiated.

attributes.name: effectiveDate
attributes.description: The date and time of the documentation of the goal.

dataClasses.name: Providers
dataClasses.description: A member of the care team

attributes.name: Providers data class
attributes.description: A member of the care team

attributes.name: Provider Name
attributes.description: The care team provider full name.

attributes.name: Provider identifier
attributes.description: This is the care team provider identifier.  This would typically be the NPI.
